name: The Guiding Winds
description:
Control:

_ swipe to call the winds to avoid every danger in your path!

_the bigger your swipe the stronger the wind

Credits:

_Programming : BlueFear_Dev

_Art : CursedSoul

_Music : free resources online 

Description:

A game where winds hear your prayers and come to your favor, You the first glider of humanity wind will help you to achieve your dreams and flight to the unknown.

Flight more and obtain score and beat your old records while obstacles try to break your progress, swipe to call the winds to avoid every danger in your path! Be the best gliding pilot that humanity has ever seen!

Game made by BlueFear_Dev and CursedSoul!
